Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

(as of Nov 30,2022 02:28:48 UTC – Details)

From the brand

High-Speed processorâ€”â€” CHUWI HeroBox Windows Mini PC features Intel Celeron J4125 low-power processor, 4 cores and 4 threads, Turbo frequency 2.7GHz, which is offers more powerful performance, brings you more smooth and wonderful user experience,and offers you smooth operation and stable multitasking experience.
8GB RAM And 256GB ROMâ€”â€” Built-in 8GB LPDDR4X, 256GB SSD, supports 512GB Micro SD extension, 512GB TF card,2TB M.2 2280 SSD,2TB 2.5-inch SATA HDD.Multi-task switching speed is extremely fast and no need to wait for application loading, especially in Microsoft Office software.
4K@60Hz Display â€”â€” CHUWI HeroBox mini computer adopt Intel UHD Graphics 600 comes with 12 execution, which had 4K ultra high definition streaming capability giving you a best-in-class television experience with true-to-life picture quality, which can be used as a media center to enjoy TV shows or games.The ability to connect with 2 monitors with HD2.0 & VGA outport greatly improves work efficiency.
High-Speed Networkâ€”â€” HeroBox mini gaming pc supports 2.4G+5G dual band WiFi and Bluetooth 4.2 which could be connected with your multimedia devices, mouse, acoustics or headset. with RJ45 Gigabit Ethernet, providing you a stable connection at higher speed. Fanless design, no noise no dust, ensure you a quiet and comfortable experience.
Bring Convenient to Your Life â€”â€” All important connections are available:1* Type-C,1* VGA, 1* HDMI 2.0, 1* Gigabit Ethernet , 2* USB 2.0, 2* USB 3.0, 1 * Micro SD Card Port, 1 * Headphone Port. 7.45.41.5 inches compact body only 0.97L,It can be put in a bag and taken away at any time. support to installed on back of the monitor or TV via VESA mount , tidy and space-saving.

  • Faster Running Speed â€”â€” CHUWI HeroBox Mini PC equips with 64-bit windows 10 Intel Celeron J4125 Quad-Core Quad-Threaded processor. And loaded with 8GB LPDDR4 RAM, 256GB SSD ROM. Powerful hardware makes it run more smoothly and stable.
  • Expand Storage by Multi-ways â€”â€” This Mini Desktop Computers support SATA HDD ( up to 2TB ) and TF card ( up to 512GBï¼‰, it comes with 2*USB 2.0 ports, 2 *USB 3.0 ports and Type-c. VGA and HD port are also availble, and the HD port can output 4K@60FPS video.
  • Greatly Improve Transmission Frequency â€”â€” HeroBox windows 10 mini pc adopts the latest wireless connectivity with Dual-Band 2.4G+5G Wi-Fi, it offers speeds up to 450Mbps on the 2.4GHz band & 1300Mbps on the 5GHz.
  • Effective Heat Dissipation â€”â€” Thermal conductive aluminum alloy are used on HeroBox to ensure continuous effective cooling in all directions. The power-saving HeroBox stays efficient and stable even after long period of work. Continuous 4-hour in use, it stays 34â„ƒ.
  • Great Home Theater PC â€”â€” CHUWI HeroBox Mirco pc with resolution up to 4096*2160@60Hz and plays 4K video smoothly, giving you a best television experience with true-to-life picture quality,which can be used as a media center to enjoy TV shows or games.
  • Place Anywhere As You Wish â€”â€” Install the HeroBox on the back of the monitor or TV via VESA international standard interface to make it an All-In-One PC. Mini body won’t take up tons of desk space and you can simply just slip it into your pocket and travel with it all the time.
  • It Is A Power Saver â€”â€” The HeroBox portable pc is intended to be energy-efficient straight out of the box. It packs with energy-efficient hardware components that work closely with the operating system to maintain the overall power consumption lower than 10 watts .
  • Authorized Windows 10 OS/Linux â€”â€” Authorized Windows 10 system was pre-installed on HeroBox tower pc, and it tackles down all kinds of tasks with high efficiency. Linux system is also supported to handle more applications use at ease.
